notes.reading-notes:
SAMPLE READING NOTES
SITUATION: money received by Dodgson College; committee of administrators and faculty to decide how to spend it; administrators and faculty not in complete agreement
administrators want:
new classroom building (to admit more students)
new gymnasium (existing one too old)
pay raises for administrators
notes.listening-notes:
SAMPLE LISTENING NOTES
faculty wants:
new classroom building (to decrease class sizes)
renovation of old gymnasium
scholarships for students

check-list.item-text: I noted the main points of the reading passage.
I noted the main points of the listening passage.
I used careful planning to outline my response.
I began with the overall topic statement.
I checked the sentence structure in my response.
I checked the grammar in my response.
